verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* we \w beseech|strong="G2065"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w by|strong="G5228"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add by\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* gathering \w together|strong="G1997"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w That|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w be|strong="G4531"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w soon|strong="G5030"\w* \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, \w or|strong="G3383"\w* be \w troubled|strong="G2360"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w letter|strong="G1992"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w from|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is at \w hand|strong="G1764"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1818"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w deceive|strong="G1818"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w any|strong="G3367"\w* \w means|strong="G5158"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \add that day shall not come\add*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* there \w come|strong="G2064"\w* a falling \w away|strong="G0646"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w man|strong="G0444"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*, the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*;

Who \w opposeth|strong="G0480"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* exalteth \w himself|strong="G5229"\w* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* that is \w worshipped|strong="G4574"\w*; so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w sitteth|strong="G2523"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w shewing|strong="G0584"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Remember \w ye|strong="G3421"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, when I \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, I \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* what \w withholdeth|strong="G2722"\w* \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="G0458"\w* \w doth|strong="G1754"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w work|strong="G1754"\w*: \w only|strong="G3440"\w* he \w who|strong="G2722"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w letteth|strong="G2722"\w* \add will let\add*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* he be \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w way|strong="G3319"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w shall|strong="G0601"\w* that \w Wicked|strong="G0459"\w* be \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall \w consume|strong="G0355"\w* with the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="G2673"\w* with the \w brightness|strong="G2015"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*:

\add Even him\add*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w working|strong="G1753"\w* of \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lying|strong="G5579"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w deceivableness|strong="G0539"\w* of \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* them that \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*; \w because|strong="G0473"\w* they \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* might be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w strong|strong="G1753"\w* \w delusion|strong="G4106"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* should \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* a \w lie|strong="G5579"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2919"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* might be \w damned|strong="G2919"\w* who \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* had \w pleasure|strong="G2106"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* are \w bound|strong="G3784"\w* to give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w alway|strong="G3842"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G0138"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* \w chosen|strong="G0138"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w sanctification|strong="G0038"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w belief|strong="G4102"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*:

\w Whereunto|strong="G1519"\w* he \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w obtaining|strong="G4047"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hold|strong="G2902"\w* the \w traditions|strong="G3862"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye have been \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, which hath \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \add us\add* \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*,

\w Comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.
